divs: Sighting Detailsmy children witnessed this event on the school bus. my son saw lights in the sky and got his phone out and started filming. they were on n henry st when they first noticed the lights. they were unsure what the object was at first, but one of my children said that it may be a ufo. you can clearly see at least three lights and when the clouds part you can make out a triangle or boomerang shaped outline between the lights. other children noticed the lights and they think the bus driver may have seen it as well. they lost sight of it when it "zoomed off" and disappeared.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Crestline
There were no other sightings in Crestline on or around October 2nd 2012
Summary: {dr}it was flying 500 ft over the ground flashing
